I should try and remember that when either me or my brethren in Ministry is asked to conduct your final rites. hahahahaha "@I Am Free ... Saw them kicking @I Am Free That is common in Politics. @Moses Sandile . I am more Zulu than you are. So where should I send you. Fort Napier or Weskoppies. I have just figured out that you are Indian. @Rob Nel You are aboslutely right. @Thando Nkutha So did I but............. @Thando Nkutha This drought doesnt help a lot my friend. @I Am Free ..I just realised that Political speeches is both about Inciting and Inspiring people. What a contradiction sometimes. @Moses Sandile ...MY LAST RESPONSE TO YOU. DESPITE YOU ATTACKING AND INSULTING ME AND OTHERS HERE. I WANT TO ASSURE YOU THAT I LOVE YOU. @Nyasimi Geoffrey I do my friend.
